description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato Hash Browns With Eggs And Ham recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato cake,Ham,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Sweet potato,Egg,Low sugar,Spinach
name: Sweet Potato Hash Browns With Eggs And Ham Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 eggs, 2 x lightly whisked, 4 x soft boiled to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Grate sweet potatoes and onion. Transfer to a sieve and squeeze out any excess moisture.
Transfer to a mixing bowl with egg, flour, herbs, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir to combine.

Preheat a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat and spray lightly with olive oil. Press 1/4 cup of sweet potato mixture into each hash brown and cook for 4 minutes on either side or until golden and crispy.
Drain on paper towel and serve with a soft boiled egg, baby spinach and ham.
